p: We identified the presence of many novel volatile compounds using gas chromatographyâ€“mass spectrometry (GC-MS) analysis, which, to the best of our knowledge, were not mentioned in the literature. Among those, we found linalool, citronellal, caryophyllene, humulene ( Figure 1), and neridiol (not represented), which were isolated and identified not only from L. candidum but from other plants as well.
